column3:
An acne-safe, sensitive-skin-safe jelly blush.

Its gel-like texture is designed to give a healthy, hydrating tint to your cheeks or anywhere you want a sun kiss on the face!

How to Use:
1. apply tinted skincare like bronzing drops and moisturizer or tinted sunscreen
2. apply to the area you want a sunkiss or flush, let absorb for 5-10 seconds
3. blend out with stippling brush or fingers, starting with the edges üíó

Video instruction by Brooke (Jellco Founder) can be found¬†here¬†

Things NOT to Do:
- Blend out with a sponge or blend right away (either of these might make it disappear on you!)
- Use over heavy foundations or bases (the skincare nature of it might disrupt your base)

Follow these steps and it will tint your skin with the most healthy natural flush.

Jellco Brand Story:

"I battled acne for¬†8 years and was tired¬†of struggling to find¬†any products suitable¬†for acne-prone skin.

3 years and $30K later we created the¬†ultimate acne-safe¬†gel makeup formula.

In march 2024,¬†jellco went viral‚Äîgaining 47K supporters and selling out in days.

We‚Äôre getting closer to creating the first completely acne-safe makeup line. Check out our newest shade and join the movement!"

-Brooke (Founder of Jellco)

¬†

Ingredients:¬†

Coral:
Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola), Butylene Glycol (and) Water (and) Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Water (and) Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Squalane, Phenoxyethanol (and) Sorbic Acid (and) Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Polyacrylate, EDTA
May contain: Red 28 Lake, Red 7 Lake, Yellow 5 Lake, Isododecane, Isohexadecane, Lecithin, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate
Pink:

Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Polyacrylamide (and) C13-14 Isoparaffin (and) Laureth-7, Squalane, Phenoxyethanol (and) Sorbic Acid (and) Caprylyl Glycol, Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) Extract, Water (and) Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Glycerin (and) Water (and) Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Extract (and) Phenoxyethanol, Xanthan Gum, EDTA, Isododecane, Isohexadecane, Lecithin, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate.

May contain: Red 28 Lake, Red 7 Lake

column2: Kuumba Made Oriental Musk Fragrance Oil
column3:
An enchanting blend of ylang ylang and mimosa that carries you to a romantic¬†balcony at dusk.

Clean and uplifting.

¬†

Alcohol free, long lasting, oil based and concentrated. A few drops go a long way.

To use: Roll a small amount onto pulse points and gently dab onto the neck as desired.¬†

Ingredients: Jojoba oil, safflower oil, fragrance.

Size: ¬†0.125 oz¬†

About the Brand:

Kuumba Made was founded in 1980 by Denise ‚ÄúKuumba‚Äù Piazza, a spirited, loving herbalist. She started the company with her handmade coconut oil infused with rose petals, calendula, and lavender flowers from her garden and a small collection of precious natural fragrance oils. Over four decades, with tireless dedication and pure intention, the company grew into a nationally recognized brand.

column2: Kuumba Made Water Goddess Fragrance Oil
column3:
Kuumba Made Water Goddess Fragrance Oil ‚Äì Mini Rollerball 0.125 oz

Immerse yourself in the serene elegance of Kuumba Made's Water Goddess Fragrance Oil.

This divine blend harmoniously combines fresh aquatic notes, soft spices, and grounding sandalwood, creating a scent that inspires confidence and connection. Perfect for those seeking a clean, long-lasting, and alcohol-free fragrance experience.

Fragrance Notes

  • Top Notes: Musk, Watery Nuances
  • Middle Notes: Muguet (Lily of the Valley), Tonka Bean
  • Base Notes: Cedarwood, Sandalwood

Fragnatica Profile

  • Main Accords: Aquatic ‚Ä¢ Musky ‚Ä¢ Powdery ‚Ä¢ Woody ‚Ä¢ Fresh
  • Longevity: Moderate to Long-lasting
  • Sillage: Intimate to Moderate
  • Gender: Unisex
  • Best for: Spring and Summer ‚Ä¢ Daytime Wear

Why Fragrance Enthusiasts Love It

According to fragrance community discussions, Water Goddess is described as a "sexy skin-like scent" with a base of Egyptian musk.

Its clean and fresh profile makes it a favorite for those seeking a subtle yet captivating aroma.

Product Highlights

  • Size: 0.125 oz (3.7 ml) Mini Rollerball
  • Type: Concentrated Perfume Oil
  • Alcohol-Free: Yes
  • Vegan & Cruelty-Free: Yes
  • Made in: USA

column2: Nemat Egyptian Musk Perfume Oil - Mini 5ml
column3:
The Egyptian Musk Fragrance Oil Roll-On from Nemat is a fresh and bold citrus fragrance. This is a long lasting fragrance which has that just-got-out-of-the-shower smell to keep you feeling confident throughout the day!

Now in a 5ml mini size

Size: 5ml

Features:

  • Clean Ingredients
  • Vegan
  • Sustainable Packaging
  • Travel Friendly Roll-On Bottle
  • Cruelty-Free

Formulated Without

  • Parabens
  • Phthalates
  • Alcohol
  • Glycols

How to Use:

Put a drop or two on your wrist and pulse points. Rub your wrists together. Rub wrists on your neck, behind the ear and over apparel. Enjoy!

Ingredients:

Fragrance, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil.

column46:
With a lineage of over 160 years, Nemat‚Äôs founders began their journey amidst the floral bounty of Udaipur, India. 

Today, Nemat honors this legacy by crafting fragrances that are a testament to quality and a tribute to the natural beauty that inspired their forefathers. 

They invite you to experience the joy and serenity their scents evoke, sharing a piece of their family's history with each bottle.

Precautions: External use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Stop use if rash or irritation occurs.

column2: Nemat Jasmine Blossom Eau De Parfum
column3:
The Jasmine Blossom Eau de Parfum by Nemat is a sensual and soothing aroma.¬†

It is inspired by the age-old tradition of wearing jasmine flowers as a hair garland.

The fragrance has been crafted with the absolute from flowers of Jasmine Sambac, also know as Mogra in India.¬†

Size: Travel Size 9ml

Key Notes:

  • Top - orange blossom
  • Base - creamy sandalwood¬†

Features:

  • Clean Ingredients
  • Vegan
  • Cruelty-Free¬†
  • Travel Friendly¬†

Formulated Without:

  • Parabens
  • Phthalates
  • Glycols

How to Use: Spritz the perfume on your pulse points like wrist, neck and inside of elbows. Rub together and Enjoy!

Ingredients: Alcohol, Fragrance(Parfum), Water (Aqua), Limonene, Linalool, Benzyl Benzoate, Farnesol, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Eugenol
